## Vector addition and Subtraction:

```{r}
ringtail<- c( 4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)

fox<- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

ringtail + fox

ringtail- fox

#Scalar multiplier
100* ringtail

#Dot Product
ringtail%*% fox
```
